description: Gottardo Piazzoni walking up scaffolding in his studio; light shining through window at left
medium: gelatin silver print; ed. 96/110 (edition of 110 numbered 1-60 and A-J)
title: Gottardo Piazzoni in his Studio, San Francisco, c.1932 from 'Ansel Adams Portfolio VI'
